articles.description: The virus leads to serious symptoms in people above 60 years or with health conditions like lung or heart disease, diabetes or compromised immunity.
articles.content: A new study released by Sir Ganga Ram Hospital (SGRH) suggests that people with blood groups A, B and Rh+ are more susceptible to Covid-19 infection. Moreover, those with blood groups O, AB and Rh- a… [+770 chars]
